questions.question: Is the image formatted as a two-panel comic with the title "The Whoopie Pie Chronicles" displayed?
questions.explanation: Image B consists of two panels with no title displayed. It appears to be a comic, but there is no visible title.

questions.question: Do the whoopie pies have cartoon-style facial expressions (eyes, mouths) and limbs to represent them as expressive characters?
questions.explanation: In Image B, while the whoopie pies are illustrated as part of a comic, they do not have added cartoon-style facial expressions or limbs to give them character-like attributes.

questions.question: Are the chocolate tops and creamy centers still clearly visible and used as the primary shapes for the characters’ heads and bodies?
questions.explanation: The chocolate tops and creamy centers of the whoopie pies are depicted clearly in the comic as the main focus of the illustration, resembling their real-world appearance.

questions.question: Is the background a playful kitchen scene with recognizable kitchen elements (e.g., stove, sink, utensils)?
questions.explanation: Image B contains elements like a spatula and possibly a kitchen setting, but it is not a detailed kitchen scene with recognizable features like a stove or sink.

questions.question: In the first panel, are two whoopie pie characters positioned on the edge of the plate, looking over with curious expressions?
questions.explanation: In Image B, there is no depiction of whoopie pie characters exhibiting expressions or being located on the edge of a plate. The comic uses symbolic representation rather than detailed character actions.

questions.question: Does Panel 1 contain a speech bubble with the text “I heard today’s flavor is mint! Let’s find it!” written in a handwritten font?
questions.explanation: Image B has written text in speech bubbles, but it does not match the specified phrase.

questions.question: In Panel 2, does one whoopie pie character hold a kitchen spatula like a sword and appear to lead forward?
questions.explanation: While there is a spatula shown in front of the whoopie pie, it is not held by a character nor does it resemble a sword-wielding pose.

questions.question: Does Panel 2 contain a speech bubble with the text “To the minty mountains!” written in a handwritten font?
questions.explanation: While there is text present in Panel 2, the specific phrase 'To the minty mountains!' does not appear.

questions.question: Do all characters have bold, thick outlines and are they colored with vibrant, flat colors without gradients or shading?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the style of the comic includes bold outlines and flat colors, matching the description of lacking gradients or shading.

questions.question: Are all text bubbles written in a handwritten font that is legible and consistent across panels?
questions.explanation: The speech bubbles in Image B are indeed in a handwritten font style, but it is not fully legible or consistent in terms of readability across panels.
